text: waliaelam 'ahl aleilm aladhin yufariqun belmhm bayn alhaqa walbatil 'ana alquran alkarim hu alhaqu alnazl min eind allah ealayk 'ayuha alrswl, la shbht fyh, wala sabil lilshaytan 'ilyh, fyzdad bih 'iymanhm, watakhdae lah qlwbhm. wa'iina allah lhady aladhin amanuu bih wabirasulih 'iilaa tariq alhaqu alwadh, wahu al'islam ynqdhhm bih min aldlal
